sentence: Tuesdays debate among Georgia Republican Senate candidates was predictably defined by the man who wasnt there Herschel Walker.
title: Georgia GOP Senate debate focuses on Herschel Walker absence

sentence: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker, the same one who claimed to have a COVID cure, is narrowly winning an early poll against Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-GA), according to The Hill.
author: Murjani Rawls
title: Herschel Walker Leads Raphael Warnock In Early Georgia Senate Poll

sentence: Trump-endorsed former NFL player Herschel Walker has emerged as Warnocks likely November opponent, but first he has to win a bruising May 24 primary.
author:
Kate Ackley
Stephanie Akin
Niels Lesniewski
Mary Ellen McIntire
title: These 10 senators are most vulnerable six months from Election Day

sentence: Former football great Herschel Walker skipped the first major Republican U.S. Senate debate, but his absence at the event in Gainesville on Saturday helped shape the back-and-forth among the five candidates who showed up.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Herschel Walkers no-show looms large over Senate GOP debate

sentence: A pro-Herschel Walker outside group, 34N22, launched a statewide billboard campaign on Tuesday tying U.S. Sen. Raphael Warnock to President Joe Bidens policies and Atlantas crime rate.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Voting rights heads to Senate floor for likely defeat

sentence: But the National Right to Life Committee is endorsing Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker, who has been outspoken in his support to outlaw abortion as he runs this year to challenge Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock of Georgia in a crucial Senate showdown that could determine whether the GOP wins back the chamber's majority.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia Senate race: Herschel Walker lands endorsement of leading anti-abortion group

sentence: But none of those military appointments, statewide elections, or traditional Republican check-list attributes have managed to compete with the sheer celebrity of Herschel Walker since he moved back to Georgia in August and announced his run for Senate, with Donald Trump's blessing.
author: Patricia Murphy
title: OPINION: How to run for Senate when you're not Herschel Walker

sentence: Former football star Herschel Walker, who earned Donald Trump's endorsement, won his Senate primary race in Georgia, beating out five other Republican candidates to face off against Democratic Senator Raphael Warnock in November.
author: Katherine Fung
title: Trump-Backed Herschel Walker, Who Questioned Evolution, Wins in Georgia
